dataQuery.sqlStatement: Select Rownum Num ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Inv_Id Invoice_Id ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Invoice_Num Sp_Invoice_Number ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Date_Invoiced Invoice_Date ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Company Service_Provider ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Service_Period Service_Period ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Services Service_Details ,Qooiv.Od_ob_Factory_Name Factory_Name ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Payment_Method Payment_Method ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Payment_Status Payment_Status ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Invoice_Owner Invoice_Owner ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Invoice_Amnt Invoice_Amount_Us ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Cost_Associated Cost_Us ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Tech_Rpt_Num Report_Id ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Entity Paid_By ,Qooiv.Od_Ob_Dispute_Yn Dispute ,Qooiv.Od_Pb_Attachment Attachment ,QOOIV.Od_Pb_Comments Comments From Q_Od_Ob_Invoicing_V Qooiv Where NVL(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Invoice_Num,'X') =NVL(:P_Sp_Inv_No,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Invoice_Num,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Date_Invoiced,'01-JAN-1908') >= Decode(To_Date(:P_Inv_Date_From,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),Null,Nvl(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Date_Invoiced,'01-JAN-1908'),To_Date(:P_Inv_Date_From,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND NVL(QOOIV.Od_Pb_Date_Invoiced,'01-JAN-1908') <= Decode(to_date(:P_Inv_Date_To,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),Null,nvl(QOOIV.Od_Pb_Date_Invoiced,'01-JAN-1908'),to_date(:P_Inv_Date_To,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Company,'X')=NVL(:P_Serv_Provider,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Pb_Company,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Services,'X')=NVL(:P_Serv_Details,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Services,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Service_Period,'X')=NVL(:P_Serv_Period,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Service_Period,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_ob_Factory_Name,'X')=NVL(:P_Factory_Name,NVL(Qooiv.Od_ob_Factory_Name,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Payment_Status,'X')=NVL(:P_Payment_Status,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Payment_Status,'X')) AND NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Invoice_Owner,'X')=NVL(:P_Inv_Owner,NVL(Qooiv.Od_Ob_Invoice_Owner,'X')) Order By 1
